snippet: As many as 100 people are feared dead after two earthquakes set off a landslide that buried more than 20 houses in northern Afghanistan on Monday, officials said.
abstract: As many as 100 people are feared dead after two earthquakes set off a landslide that buries more than 20 houses in northern Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: As many as 100 people are feared dead after two earthquakes set off a landslide that buried more than 20 houses in northern Afghanistan on Monday, officials said.
